Spring Onion Crop.Description: Adds a crop for spring onions.

Ginger Crop.Description: Adds a late-game crop for ginger.

Common Mushroom Crop.Description: Adds a 'bush' or crop for common mushrooms.

Morel Crop.Description: Adds a 'bush' or crop for morels.

Chanterelle Crop.Description: Adds a 'bush' or crop for chanterelles.

Salmonberry/Blackberry Crop.Description: Adds a seasonal bush that produces salmonberries and blackberries.

Coffee Bush.Description: Turns coffee beans from a crop into a bush (if you have Custom Bush installed).

Blueberry Bush.Description: Turns blueberries from a crop into a bush (if you have Custom Bush installed).

Cactus Bush.Description: Turns cactus fruit from a crop into a bush (if you have Custom Bush installed).

Grape Trellis.Description: Turns grapes from a crop into a bush (if you have Custom Bush installed).

Hops Trellis.Description: Turns hops from a crop into a bush (if you have Custom Bush installed).
